name: Puzzle Dot Line Brain
description:
Puzzle Dot Line Brain is simple, creative puzzle game and easy to play. You need only drag the dot line and fill out space on the girds
How to play
- Touch and drag the dot line to move them.
- You need fill all in the rows or columns, the dot line will be clear and you get the point. Game will be over if there are no space in the grids.
